text: (nabiyē!) niyata vaśayenma api obaṭa perada bohomayak dūtayinva ovungē janatāva veta yævvemu. ovunda ovun veta pæhædili vū dæya (vana sādhakayan) gena āvāha. (ehet ēvā ovun pratikṣēpa kara dæmūha). ebævin (ēvā pratikṣēpa kaḷa) væradikaruvan veta api paḷi gattemu. (mandayat mesē paḷi gena) viśvāsavantayinṭa udav kirīma apa kerehi anivāryaya yutukamak vaśayen tibuṇi
